description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Set off your explosion at the right time to start a chain reaction and rack up the points! Share highscores with friends, Addictive Gameplay, Inovative Sound Design.
